s.text: That is why it was invented, and that is why the Bush brothers brag about its success.
That is why it was invented, and that is why the Bush brothers brag about its success.
Guaranteed admission has restored minority enrollments at Texas' Austin campus, for example, to levels not seen since 1996, when a federal court struck down the state's affirmative action program.

You only have to imagine a state policy applying the high-school quota system to, say, basketball scholarships--and explicitly being praised by state officials as a way to increase the number of white basketball players--to realize how empty the claims are that this arrangement avoids the alleged evil of racial preference.

You only have to imagine a state policy applying the high-school quota system to, say, basketball scholarships--and explicitly being praised by state officials as a way to increase the number of white basketball players--to realize how empty the claims are that this arrangement avoids the alleged evil of racial preference.
Since most blacks attend overwhelmingly black high schools, the result is much closer to that of taking the top 10 percent of each race.
, America's high schools are still severely segregated.
, America's high schools are still severely segregated.
